head.title: Valders Area School District | Educate. Engage. Inspire.

div.a: +

div.h2: School Buildings Continue to be Closed

div.div: The school buildings are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. All teaching and learning will continue through online instruction. More information will be provided soon.
